entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor has HttpClient issues on small screens #47815
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #47810
  • Basic IFormFile model validation attributes #47809
  • Enable static graph restore in build #47808
  • QuickGrid: Sample showing how to change color of sorting indicator does not work #47805
  • [Blazor] Form events follow ups #47804
    8.0-preview5
  • Incorrect CSS import created when hosting multiple WASM apps not at root #47803
  • `dotnet watch` ignores `StaticWebAssetBasePath` for third-party library #47802
  • embedded linux-arm dotnet 6/7 segmentation fault #47801

Closed

  • Generate form field identifiers for Blazor server-side rendering #47780
  • Different logging behaviour between net 6 and 7 for Request Body in HttpLoggingMiddleware #47216
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_ef, json #47727
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #47785
  • Perf regression: https #47786
  • Update the Worker template to use the `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` API. #43113
    8.0-preview4
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Open Id Connect cookies are being block by Gateway WAF #47583

PullRequests

Created

  • Add RequiresUnreferencedCode attribute to AddMvc calls. #47816
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Add support for accessing the request body form parameters #47814
    area-blazor
  • Test restore static graph #47813
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47811
    Servicing-consider, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-consider, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.x
  • Write log message for matched fallback routes #47798
    area-runtime
  • Add default configuration and logging to CreateSlimBuilder #47797
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Log if a server certificate lacks the subjectAlternativeName extensions #47678
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 8.0-preview4
  • Exclude more problematic assemblies from the ASP.NET composite #47812
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Blazor form model expression formatting #47754
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47794
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, 8.0-preview4
  • [blazor] Boot handled by dotnet.js #47752
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • Update ReadMe.SharedCode.md to mention runtime-sync.yml #47722
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Update the Worker template to use `Host.CreateApplicationBuilder` #47720
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Sync shared code from runtime #47793
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • [Blazor] Adds support for server side rendered forms (without a body) #47716
    area-blazor
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    area-runtime
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity, pending-ci-rerun
  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, blog-candidate, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2163359 #47784
    area-mvc
  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Fix F# starter web template. #47697
    area-mvc
  • Replace lock with CAS #47751
    area-runtime
  • Update servicing milestones for June #47765
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Fix null property name handling logic in SystemTextJsonValidationMetadataProvider #47775
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf
  • Update MessagePack version #47790
    area-signalr
  • Fix nullref when getting struct from feature collection and it isn't present #47795
    area-runtime
  • Simplify and optimize async parameters in RequestDelegateFactory #42588
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Update LoginDisplay.IndividualB2CAuth.razor #47654
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make HttpLogging middleware endpoint aware #47595
    area-runtime, feature-middleware
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
